original_text: Tell me how I fixed the foundations of the earth. Who made it stay in its right place? I did! Tell me how I fixed the foundations of the earth.
korean_text: 그것의 주추는 무엇 위에 세웠으며 그 모퉁잇돌을 누가 놓았느냐

sentences.original_text: Tell me how I fixed the foundations of the earth.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 땅의 기초를 어떻게 세웠는지 말해보라.

sentences.original_text: Who made it stay in its right place?
Tell me how I fixed the foundations of the earth.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 땅의 기초를 어떻게 세웠는지 말해보라.
